definition: felt a chill (in one's heart)/(one's heart) sank

the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
to cut off (a length)/to stop/to intercept/section/chunk/length

sentences.english: When he knew that she had been going out with several other men, it cooled his ardor.
sentences.chinese: 當他知道她曾與好幾個男人出去時，他的心涼了半截。

sentences.english: The idea of going to school left him cold.
sentences.chinese: 想到要去上學他的心就涼了半截。
